name: XSD Validator
description: A tool to validate XML documents against XSD schemas
functional_requirements: Users can upload XML and XSD files via POST /api/validate and receive detailed validation results
Users can view validation history ordered by newest first via GET /api/history
Users can re-run validation on previous submissions via POST /api/history/{history_id}/revalidate without re-uploading files
System stores XML/XSD content, filenames, validation results, and errors with timestamps in SQLite database
stylistic_requirements: Display file upload forms with file preview functionality for XML and XSD files
Show validation results with clear success/error messages and detailed error output from lxml
Implement loading indicators during file upload and validation processes
Use proper error handling for file upload failures with user-friendly messages

control_endpoints.description: Health check endpoint for monitoring backend availability
API status endpoint returning service information
